Player History
Earned first career win on 4/7/1985...
2/2/1986: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,342,857 through salary arbitration...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/5/1986, off Steve Bedrosian (ATL)...
2/2/1987: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,342,857 through salary arbitration...
6/24/1987: Signed a contract extension with St. Louis, $2,780,000 per year, for 2 years.
Traded from St. Louis to Toronto on 7/28/1989 (Going to STL: P Brent Gaff, P Vince Horsman, C Tom Pagnozzi, RF Tim Salmon. Going to TOR: P Ken Dayley, P Todd Worrell)...
8/20/1989: Signed a contract extension with Toronto, $2,800,000 per year, for 1 years.
8/11/1990: Signed a contract extension with Toronto, $860,000 per year, for 2 years.
9/2/1990: Signed a contract extension with Toronto, $860,000 per year, for 2 years.
Released by Toronto on 7/19/1991...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 3/3/1992 to a minor league contract.
